r.d: With Parle, it is possible to implement lexing and parsing in PHP while relying on features and principles of the parser/lexer generator tools for C/C++.
r.n: - Improved var_dump() output for Parle\Stack - Parser::trace() will return NULL if called in inappropriate context - Fixed Lexer functionality while used in Parser - Lexers always use DOT_NOT_LF | DOT_NOT_CRLF flags by default - General bugfixes
